oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere.-By |han=kass'o. (L VIII.-22. 7969-7972, 7974 and 7975, 7983-7993, 23. 7995-8004). |han=kass'o describes a copy of rock painting no. 8., in which there is a depiction of a rain-bull in the clouds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 8: the rain and the rain-bull
